metadata.title: CVE-2022-29967 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
static_compressed_inmemory_website_callback.c in Glewlwyd through 2.6.2allows directory traversal.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29967` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glewlwyd - 2.7.1-1ubuntu1
glewlwyd-common - 2.7.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glewlwyd package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-1ubuntu1').
